user_query: I need to plan a sustainable road trip from Los Angeles to San Francisco. Can you calculate the carbon footprint for this trip by car and suggest public transit options for certain sections of the journey? Also, provide me with nutritional information for some healthy snacks I can pack for the trip.

TaskList.description: Calculate the carbon footprint for a road trip from Los Angeles to San Francisco by car.
Suggest public transit options for specific segments of the journey between Los Angeles and San Francisco.
Provide nutritional information for healthy snacks that can be packed for the trip.
